tool_description: Evaluates lifestyle factors including time constraints, budget, styling preferences, and environmental factors that affect hair care routine feasibility.

available_time_morning.description: Minutes available for morning hair routine (5-120)

available_time_evening.description: Minutes available for evening hair routine (5-120)

budget_range.description: Monthly hair care budget: under 25, 25-50, 50-100, 100-200, over 200

styling_complexity_preference.description: Preferred routine complexity: minimal, simple, moderate, or elaborate

activity_level.description: Physical activity frequency: sedentary, light, moderate, or high

wash_frequency_preference.description: Preferred hair washing frequency: daily, every other day, twice weekly, weekly

error_messages: Invalid time range: Morning and evening time must be between 5-120 minutes
Invalid budget range: Must be one of [under 25, 25-50, 50-100, 100-200, over 200]
Invalid styling preference: Must be one of [minimal, simple, moderate, elaborate]
Invalid activity level: Must be one of [sedentary, light, moderate, high]
Invalid wash frequency: Must be one of [daily, every other day, twice weekly, weekly]
Empty climate conditions: Must specify at least one environmental factor
usage: Specify time available for hair care, budget constraints, preferred routine complexity, environmental conditions you face, activity level, and desired washing frequency.

routine_feasibility_score.description: Score indicating how complex a routine is manageable (1-10)
